sentences.en: A flock of crows wheeled overhead.
sentences.cn: 一群乌鸦在头顶上盘旋。

sentences.en: A number of birds are circling overhead.
sentences.cn: 很多鸟在头顶上空盘旋。

sentences.en: A plane flew overhead.
sentences.cn: 一架飞机从头顶飞过。

sentences.en: Aircraft passed overhead with monotonous regularity .
sentences.cn: 飞机一次又一次反复从头顶飞过。

sentences.en: Bullets whizzed overhead.
sentences.cn: 子弹嗖嗖地掠过头顶。

sentences.en: Buzzards soar overhead at a great height.
sentences.cn: 秃鹰在高空翱翔。

sentences.en: Many stars overhead are invisible to the naked eye.
sentences.cn: 天上的许多星星是肉眼看不到的.

sentences.en: Overhead cranes were lifting giant sheets of steel.
sentences.cn: 高架起重机正吊起一块块巨大的钢板。

sentences.en: overhead power lines
sentences.cn: 高架输电线

sentences.en: Overhead, the chopper roared and the big blades churned the air.
sentences.cn: 头顶上，直升机在呼啸，巨大的螺旋桨叶片搅动着空气。

sentences.en: Planes flew overhead constantly.
sentences.cn: 飞机不断从头顶上飞过。

sentences.en: She turned on the overhead light and looked around the little room.
sentences.cn: 她打开顶灯，环视这间小屋。

sentences.en: That city has decided to do away with overhead wires.
sentences.cn: 那个城市决定取消架在空中的电线.

sentences.en: The air reeked of kerosene and huge aircraft rumbled overhead.
sentences.cn: 空气中散发着煤油味，巨型飞机在头顶隆隆地响着。

sentences.en: The fireworks cracked overhead.
sentences.cn: 鞭炮在头顶上空噼啪地爆响。

sentences.en: The overhead bird flew away.
sentences.cn: 头上的鸟飞走了.

sentences.en: The people in the room overhead were very noisy yesterday evening.
sentences.cn: 昨晚在楼上那个房间的人很吵.

sentences.en: The planes flew overhead with a low drone.
sentences.cn: 飞机发出低沉的轰鸣声掠过头顶.

sentences.en: The thunder crashed overhead.
sentences.cn: 头顶上雷声隆隆。

sentences.en: The trees arch overhead.
sentences.cn: 树木在头顶上弯成拱形.

sentences.en: There was a big moon and hundreds of stars were shining overhead.
sentences.cn: 头顶是一轮明月和成百上千颗闪烁的星星。

sentences.en: There were ominous dark clouds gathering overhead.
sentences.cn: 不祥的阴霾在头顶上汇聚。

phrases.tran_cn: 制造费用；间接制造成本
锅顶仓，吊挂箱；舱顶行李箱
营业费用；企业管理费用
架空输电线；高架输电线路

trans.tran_cn: 上面的，高架的，头顶上的，（费用、开支等）经常的，管理的
trans.tran_en: You use overhead to indicate that something is above you or above the place that you are talking about
above your head or in the sky

trans.tran_cn: 在头顶上，在空中，在楼上，向上
trans.tran_en: above your head or in the sky

trans.tran_cn: 经常性支出，运营费用（常用复数 overheads），（用于高射投影仪的）透明胶片，（飞机的）顶舱，天花板
trans.tran_en: money spent regularly on rent, insurance, electricity, and other things that are needed to keep a business operating
